name: Organic Cotton Crochet Knit Tank Top

prompts.flatlay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Organic Cotton Crochet Knit Tank Top in Natural, 100% organic cotton.

COMPOSITION: Follow the line drawing guide for garment placement. IMPORTANT: Maintain realistic tank top proportions - sleeveless design with natural width-to-height ratio. Do NOT stretch or elongate the garment vertically.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- NO BUTTONS: This is a sleeveless tank top with no button placket.
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets in the lower right area of the tank top (near the hem). The eyelets are BLACK/dark metal, not silver.
- NECKLINE: Scoop neck or round neckline (not a collar), neatly shaped.
- Ron Dorff label visible at the inside neckline.

STYLING: Tank top laid perfectly flat with relaxed, natural proportions. Armholes/sleeveless sides shaped naturally. Open-weave crochet knit texture visible throughout.

COLOR: Match the EXACT color from the input image - warm beige/sand tone, NOT bright white or cream. The "Natural" color is a muted, earthy beige with subtle warmth. Preserve the original color temperature.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. No harsh shadows. Do NOT overexpose or wash out the garment color.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end fashion e-commerce aesthetic. The tank should look natural and relaxed, not stretched.
prompts.eyelet:
Macro detail shot of the eyelets on this crochet knit tank top.

CRITICAL - CANNY GUIDE (last image):
If the last image is a BLACK AND WHITE LINE DRAWING, follow it EXACTLY:
- Position the fabric EXACTLY as shown in the line drawing
- Match the same diagonal angle and crop
- Match the eyelet positioning as shown

WHAT TO SHOW:
- Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver)
- Eyelets positioned near the hem area
- The crochet knit fabric texture surrounding the eyelets
- Hem/edge of the tank top visible

COPY FROM INPUT IMAGES:
- EXACT warm beige/sand "Natural" color from the input images
- EXACT open-weave crochet knit texture - same stitch pattern, same hole size
- The BLACK metal eyelet finish (dark gunmetal, not silver)

COMPOSITION: Close-up/macro shot. Garment fabric laid flat at diagonal angle showing the two eyelets clearly.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional studio lighting. Even illumination.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface.
prompts.collar:
E-commerce collar/neckline detail shot of this crochet knit tank top.

CRITICAL - CANNY GUIDE (last image):
The LAST image is a BLACK AND WHITE LINE DRAWING showing the EXACT composition. You MUST:
- Position the tank top EXACTLY as shown in the line drawing
- Match the same camera angle (top-down)
- Match the same garment layout and positioning
- The line drawing is your composition blueprint - follow it precisely

WHAT THIS IS:
- A sleeveless TANK TOP (NOT a shirt, NOT a polo)
- Scoop neckline / round neckline
- NO collar, NO buttons
- Sleeveless with armholes

COPY FROM INPUT IMAGES (images 1-2):
- EXACT warm beige/sand "Natural" color - this is NOT white, it's a muted earthy beige
- EXACT open-weave crochet knit texture - same stitch pattern, same hole size
- Ron Dorff label at inside neckline

STYLING:
- Tank top laid COMPLETELY FLAT on the surface
- NO bunching, NO wrinkles, NO 3D folds
- Fabric smooth and flat like a professional flat lay photo

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional studio lighting. Clean, even exposure.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface.
prompts.fabrics:
Extreme close-up macro shot of the fabric texture on this crochet knit tank top.

WHAT TO PHOTOGRAPH:
- The distinctive open-weave crochet knit pattern
- Show the holes/gaps in the weave clearly
- Individual yarn/thread construction visible

COMPOSITION:
- Fill the frame with fabric texture
- Top-down angle, fabric laid completely flat
- Close enough to see individual stitches and the weave pattern

CRITICAL - COPY FROM INPUT IMAGE:
- Match the EXACT crochet knit pattern from the input photo
- Same hole size, same stitch density, same weave structure
- This is 100% organic cotton with a distinctive open, airy weave

COLOR: Warm beige/sand "Natural" tone. Do NOT brighten to white or wash out the earthy warmth.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT professional e-commerce studio lighting. Clean, even, well-lit exposure. No dark shadows, no moody lighting. This should look like a bright, clean product photo - NOT dark or underexposed.

BACKGROUND: LIGHT warm gray studio surface - bright and clean, not dark.
prompts.front:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build.

OUTFIT - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- TOP: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Warm beige/sand crochet knit with open-weave texture. Sleeveless tank with scoop neckline. Black metal eyelets near hem.
- BOTTOMS: {{bottomsDesc}} - copy EXACTLY from input images, no substitutions.

POSE: Match the reference photo (last image). Front-facing, waist up. Confident, relaxed stance. Shows off the sleeveless cut and neckline.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: Copy the lighting and background from the reference image - bright, clean e-commerce studio with light gray backdrop.
prompts.3/4:
E-commerce on-model photo. Copy the pose and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build.

OUTFIT - MUST MATCH EXACTLY:
- TOP: {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images. Warm beige/sand crochet knit with open-weave texture. Sleeveless tank with scoop neckline. IMPORTANT: Black metal RON DORFF eyelets on lower right of tank MUST be clearly visible.
- BOTTOMS: {{bottomsDesc}} - copy EXACTLY from input images, no substitutions.

POSE: Match the reference photo (last image). 3/4 body shot from mid-thigh up. Standing pose, body angled. Frame shot so eyelets on tank hem are visible.

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: Copy the lighting and background from the reference image - bright, clean e-commerce studio with light gray backdrop.
